segments.text: How do you like the play ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is very dull , and the production isn't very satisfactory , either .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You're absolutely right . I think the acting could be better .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: To be fair , both the costumes and scenery are marvelous .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe you're right . But I really don't like it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , we'd better go to a musical comedy next time . I think the one we saw last month was very good .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , they had constant changes of scene , and I love variety .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Me , too . I hate to sit there and look at the same stage scenery one scene after another .
segments.speaker: S2
